channel.title: Jiajian Fu's site
channel.description: this is Jiajian Fu's profile site

item.title: ðŸ“ŒREADMEï½œHelloðŸ‘‹, I'm Jiajian(Jain)Fu
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: This is a pinned post with my CV

item.title: Additive Manufacturingï½œTopology Design of Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Based on Multi-objective Optimization
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Out of interest, I joined my manufacturing course teacher Kun Li’s laboratory (HÏ€AM of State Key Laboratory of Mechanical Transmission in Chongqing University) to learn about engineering analysis of additive manufacturing, mainly focusing on shape memory alloys and multi-objective based Optimal Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Topology Design

item.title: Publicationï½œA device with thermoelectric power generation and heat dissipation functions and a thermoelectric power generation method
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: During my freshman year, I participated in the National Undergraduate Energy Conservation and Emission Reduction Social Practice and Science and Technology Competition Project, and was responsible for the 3D model design, rendering and sample production. Won the third prize at the national level and applied for an invention patent

item.title: Publicationï½œA Review of Metal-to-Plastic Joinery in Automotive Manufacturing
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: This post will introduce the paper I participated in the research project about the joining of plastic and metal parts in the automotive industry.I studied more than 100 related documents, and formed a group led by the first author and corresponding author.

item.title: Course Projectï½œManufacturing
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Introduction to Manufacturing course projects. Our team designed a gear system suitable for the RoboMaster competition through material selection, processing technology selection, structural design simulation, strength verification and sustainability analysis.

item.title: Art Designï½œVacuum Flourescent Display
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Merging engineering and art has always been my dream. Using my engineering experience in robot design and manufacturing, I designed a clock that was displayed using a vacuum fluorescent displayï¼ˆVFDï¼‰tube

item.title: Course Projectï½œErgonomics
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Introduction to ergonomics course projects. The operation requirements of tower cranes were analyzed, and a simple, efficient and safe remote tower crane operation mode was designed. Implement simulation with Unity.

item.title: Art Designï½œGem Clock Necklace
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Merging engineering and art has always been my dream. Using my engineering experience in manufacturing, I designed a necklace in SOLIDWORKS using old Seiko mechanical watch movements, gemstones, Ag925 silver necklace and SLA and SLM 3D printed parts

item.title: Robot Designï½œBionic Ostrich Robot
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: It is National second prize winning works of the 10th National College Students Mechanical Innovation Design Competition.The funny thing is, it all started with an idea I had in the shower……

item.title: Robot Designï½œMX_2 Engineer
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: A comprehensive introduction to MX_2 Engineer from the perspectives of design background, design metrics, mechanical design, hardware design, and software design
